item.description: WeWeb is the fastest way to build production-ready web apps: - connect multiple data sources (e.g. Airtable, REST APIs, XANO, PostgreSQL) - visually design your frontend or add custom components (vue.js / react) - build no-code workflows or add custom JS

item.title: The Cold Start Problem - A book about how to start and scale network effects
item.description: Based on 100s of interviews with founding teams at Twitch, Tinder, Uber, Airbnb, Pinterest, and many more, Andrew Chen explores how tech‚Äôs most successful companies solved the dreaded "cold start problem‚Äù using network effects to launch and scale.

item.title: Gentler - Support long-term wellbeing by knowing your activity levels
item.description: Knowing your activity levels and having them guide your active life lowers the chances of fatigue, burnout, injury. Gentler monitors your fitness progress and nudges you to slow down, step up, or rest. It is personalized, appropriate for all fitness levels.

item.description: Fathom records, transcribes, and replaces note taking with a click of a button on your Zoom calls, so you can simply focus on the conversation at hand. Easily share call highlights with your team via email, Slack, or auto-generated summaries sent to your CRM.

item.content:encoded: Problem-solution pairs that tell you what works and what doesn't. These are the categories we tackle: * Ideation * Hiring * Leadership * Marketing * Getting investors * Time management * Idea validation * Market needs * Growth Hacking
